result.title: Final Dissemination, Communication and Events Report
result.description: This document will be the final report on all various dissemination and communication activities pursued within the ChiC project. It will provide a critical assessment of the most successful actions and means, trying to qualitatively and quantitatively measure the impact generated within the CAPS community and beyond.

result.title: CAPS outputs catalogue - First draft
result.description: This deliverable will present all CAPS outputs in an exhaustive but communicative way and is the deliverable of Task 3.3. The deliverable will be submitted in two versions, version a (D3.2) at month 15 presenting the outputs available at the end of the CAPS first year and a version b (D3.4) at month 23 when more outputs will become available. This deliverable will be in paper form as well as in multimedia format to be carefully planned in order to select the most appropriate mean of communication (a dedicate web page, a set of short videos, a searchable data base, etc.)
